hints.content: Jo baked $5$ rows of cookies with $4$ cookies in each row.

This array shows $\blueE5$ rows with $\purpleD4$ squares in each row.

![A group of 5 lines with 4 squares in each line. The squares are numbered at the top 1 through 4. The squares are numbered at the left 1 through 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4c94ab72a5e867b38381e80c8c679200a59b1dbd)

This image shows how Jo arranged her cookies: 

![A group of 5 lines with 4 squares in each line.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3a74c088605820be724fbdf7675a5309c5a9948b)

question.content:
Jo made a batch of cookies. She baked $5$ rows of cookies with $4$ cookies in each row.

**Which image below shows how Jo arranged her cookies?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A group of 5 lines with 4 squares in each line.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3a74c088605820be724fbdf7675a5309c5a9948b)
![A group of 3 lines with 5 squares in each line.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a66e9ddc613b8bb950725cd0fa23e2e94c383b84)
![A group of 2 lines with 5 squares in the first line and 4 squares in the second line.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5f5caef77409f99fb81d83c1dcf23d296f6276f4)
